thread.title: Carrizo Oil & Gas Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 Financial Results Release Date and Conference Call and Participation in Upcoming Conferences

author: cnbc.com
title: Carrizo Oil & Gas Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 Financial Results Release Date and Conference Call and Participation in Upcoming Conferences
text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Carrizo Oil & Gas, Inc. (Nasdaq: CRZO) will hold a conference call to discuss 2017 fourth quarter and full year financial results on Tuesday, February 27, 2018 at 10:00 AM Central Standard Time. Carrizo plans to issue a press release containing its financial and operating results after the market closes on Monday, February 26, 2018.
Date & Time: Tuesday, February 27 at 10:00 AM CST Dial-In Number: (877) 256-3271 (U.S. & Canada) +1 (212) 231-2939 (Intl./Local) Telephone Replay Number: (800) 633-8284 (U.S. & Canada) +1 (402) 977-9140 (Intl./Local) Enter Replay Reservation #: 21882319 The replay will be available through Tuesday, March 6, 2018 at 12:00 PM CST. A simultaneous webcast of the call may be accessed over the internet by visiting our website at http://www.carrizo.com , clicking on "Upcoming Events", and then clicking on "2017 Fourth Quarter and Year-end Conference Call Webcast." To listen, please go to the website in time to register and install any necessary software. The webcast will be archived for replay on the Carrizo website for 7 days.
Additionally, Carrizo management is scheduled to present at the following upcoming conferences. A webcast of the presentations, if available, as well as the slide books used can be accessed on the Carrizo website at http://www.carrizo.com under the “Investor Relations” section.
Credit Suisse 22 nd Annual Energy Summit
Tuesday, February 13, 2018 at 9am CST
Vail, CO
Simmons & Company International 18 th Annual Energy Conference
Thursday, March 1, 2018
Las Vegas, NV
Raymond James & Associates’ 38 th Annual Institutional Investors Conference
Tuesday, March 6, 2018 at 8:15am CST
Orlando, FL
Scotia Howard Weil 2018 Energy Conference
Tuesday, March 27, 2018 at 2:05 pm CST
New Orleans, LA
Carrizo Oil & Gas, Inc. is a Houston-based energy company actively engaged in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas from resource plays located in the United States. Our current operations are principally focused in proven, producing oil and gas plays primarily in the Eagle Ford Shale in South Texas and the Permian Basin in West Texas.
